channel.title: CVE Feed for GE HealthCare -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GE HealthCare -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-14004|2024-08-05T19:13:41.677Z -- ge%20healthcare -- ge%20gemnet%20license%20server%20aka.%20%28echoserver%29
item.description: GE GEMNet License server (EchoServer) all current versions are affected these devices use default or hard-coded credentials. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication and gain access to the affected devices.

item.title: CVE-2017-14002|2024-08-05T19:13:41.691Z -- ge%20healthcare -- ge%20infinia
item.description: GE Infinia/Infinia with Hawkeye 4 medical imaging systems all current versions are affected these devices use default or hard-coded credentials. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication and gain access to the affected devices.

item.title: CVE-2017-14008|2024-08-05T19:13:41.648Z -- ge%20healthcare -- ge%20centricity%20pacs%20ra1000
item.description: GE Centricity PACS RA1000, diagnostic image analysis, all current versions are affected these devices use default or hard-coded credentials. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication and gain access to the affected devices.

item.title: CVE-2017-14006|2024-08-05T19:13:41.557Z -- ge%20healthcare -- ge%20xeleris
item.description: GE Xeleris versions 1.0,1.1,2.1,3.0,3.1, medical imaging systems, all current versions are affected, these devices use default or hard-coded credentials. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may allow a remote attacker to bypass authentication and gain access to the affected devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-27106|2024-08-02T00:27:59.190Z -- ge%20healthcare -- echopac%20software%20only
item.description: Vulnerable data in transit in GE HealthCare EchoPAC products
